# Regulatory Affairs Support Services

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

**Reference Number:** cb-7309-65899967
**Solicitation Number:** W6369-22-A062/C
**Publication Date:** 2023-07-17
**Tender Closing Date:** Cancelled
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

## Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites consultant teams to provide regulatory affairs and product development services to support the collection and preparation of regulatory submissions for drugs and medical devices in accordance with Health Canada regulations. The proposed period of the contract will run from the contract award date until March 31, 2025, with possible extension options for one year periods, ending on March 31, 2028.

## Requirements

* A team of regulatory affairs and product development specialists to prepare and file regulatory submissions to meet Health Canada regulations
* Two strategic level professionals, two general level professionals, and one administrative resource

## Specification

* Services must be provided by a team of experts with specialized knowledge in regulatory affairs and product development
* Expertise should be in regulatory submissions for drugs and medical devices
* Familiarity with Health Canada regulations is a must

## Contracting Entity

* **Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Scott Serafin
	+ Email: [Scott.Serafin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Scott.Serafin@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 542-3058

## Notice

This is a Request for Proposal, and the Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
